EmailTemplate.name: 12DecWeb-ACA.Sorry Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you - Resources from our ACA Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}}, You were missed at our “The Affordable Care Act: What Independent Consultants Need to Know" webinar held on Thursday, December 12. Gene Zaino and Dave Putt, both experts on the independent workforce, provided essential information on the ACA basics with a special focus on the independent worker. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/38FVT5SY-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_ACA%20Webinar_Slides.pdf> Downloadable ACA Guide <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Affordable_Care_Act_Guide.pdf>
